1902.HK.summary: Yincheng International Holding Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in the property development activities in Mainland China. It develops and sells residential properties, including high-rise and multi-story apartments, and low-density houses, as well as commercial properties; provides property management services; operates hotels; and leasing of investment properties. The company also engages in medical management and consulting activities. Yincheng International Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Nanjing, the People's Republic of China.
